visualRecognition

Class ImageContentDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualRecognition.ImageContentDescription

  • public class ImageContentDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageContentDescription class implements an application that displays image content description of an input image.

      generate Information of faces detected and Identify faces celebrity
      void generateJsonDescription(java.lang.String filename)
      generateJsonDescription function uses the both routines of VisualRecognition service to generate Information of faces detected and to Identify faces celebrity objects classification
